entry.title: Colombia SMS Carrier Maintenance
entry.summary: THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 16, 18:00 - 19:00 PST Jan 13, 14:29 PST Scheduled - Our SMS carrier partner in Colombia is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2023 at 18:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent failures processing SMS with URL marketing campaigns to Colombia handsets.

Jan 16, 13:40 PST Monitoring - We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Moov network in Ivory Coast. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Jan 16, 13:33 PST Update - We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Moov network in Ivory Coast. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Jan 16, 12:46 PST Investigating - We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Moov network in Ivory Coast. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Incident: Some Android users may be experiencing issues when trying to access a workspace
entry.summary: Our team identified that this issue has not impacted the Slack production app and current Android users should not be experiencing issues accessing their workspace. We will resolve this issue internally before our next Android app release.

entry.title: Incident: Users may experience issues accessing or loading Slack, have trouble creating posts, and using Workflow Builder.
entry.summary: We've resolved the issue with access to Slack. Posts and workflows are back to full functionality. If you're still encountering any trouble, please reload Slack using Command + Shift + R (Mac) or Ctrl + Shift + R (Windows/Linux). Thank you for your patience while we worked on resolving this issue.

entry.title: Servers down
entry.summary: Jan 16, 09:00 PST Resolved - Notion was down between 8:56 - 9:12 AM PT. Service is now recovered.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Jan 16, 16:43 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 16, 16:31 UTC Update - We found an issue that caused high database replication lag, leading to issues visible in multiple services. We have resolved this issue and are expecting services to become healthy once queues drain. Jan 16, 15:51 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident: Some customers may be unable to complete SSO configuration
entry.summary:
From January 6th at 8:42 AM PST to January 15th at 10:00 PM PST, some users were running into issues when completing their SSO configuration. In the SSO settings the "Test Configuration" button led to an error message page.
We identified a recent code change as the cause of the issue and a fix was launched to correct it.

entry.title: Inbound Call Failures to a Subset of Twilio Indonesia Phone Numbers
entry.summary: Jan 15, 22:59 PST Resolved - The issue affecting inbound calls to a subset of Twilio Indonesia phone numbers has been resolved, and the service is functioning normally at this time. Jan 15, 20:59 PST Monitoring - We have started seeing recovery for inbound calls to a subset of Twilio Indonesia phone numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Jan 15, 19:10 PST Update - We are still observing inbound calls failures to a subset of Twilio Indonesia phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Jan 15, 18:10 PST Update - We are observing inbound calls failures to a subset of Twilio Indonesia phone numbers. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Jan 15, 18:03 PST Investigating - Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue impacting inbound calls to a subset of Twilio Indonesia phone numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update within the next 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Users may be able to use the desktop client as a workaround. Jan 14, 15:13 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Copilot
entry.summary: Jan 12, 04:55 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 12, 04:51 UTC Update - Some Copilot plans were impacted by a recent backend change causing those users to see an error that access has ended. We have applied a change to correct this and are seeing full recovery. Jan 12, 03:59 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Copilot.

entry.title: Make intermittent login issues
entry.summary: Jan 11, 17:36 CET Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 11, 12:00 CET Monitoring - The root cause of the issue has been identified and a remedy is already in place . Some users might have experienced troubles with logging in to the platform whilst we can confirm that there was no impact on running scenarios . We are actively monitoring the situation . Jan 11, 11:37 CET Investigating - We are currently experiencing intermittent issues when logging in to make zones . We are actively investigating the issue and working on a solution.

entry.title: Incident with Actions and Git Operations
entry.summary: Jan 10, 18:14 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 10, 17:54 UTC Update - Some action hosted runners are experiencing longer than normal run times. Jan 10, 17:22 UTC Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one. Jan 10, 17:04 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations.

entry.title: 500 Errors Across Multiple Endpoints
entry.summary: Jan 9, 15:10 PST Resolved - From 14:00-15:00 Pacific Time (PT), we saw increased 500 errors for multiple API endpoints, including reservations, listings and threads. The issue is now identified and resolved, please retry any failed requests during this time. Apologies for the inconvenience caused due to this incident and thank you for your patience and understanding.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Jan 7, 23:30 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 7, 23:25 UTC Update - We are investigating reports of timeouts with Actions. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation. Jan 7, 22:50 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Delay in email delivery due to third-party outage
entry.summary: Jan 5, 15:49 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 5, 02:25 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Jan 5, 01:45 UTC Update - We are continuing to monitor our third-party service provider for updates. Service has not been restored by the third-party email provider. Once service is restored, the majority of emails that were not sent during the outage will be resent. Jan 5, 01:14 UTC Update - We are continuing to monitor our third-party service provider for updates. Service has not been restored by the third-party email provider. Once service is restored, the majority of emails that were not sent during the outage will be resent. Jan 5, 00:38 UTC Update - Service has not been restored by the third-party email provider. Once service is restored, the majority of emails that were not sent during the outage will be resent. Jan 5, 00:17 UTC Identified - A fix has been implemented by the third-party service. We are working to confirm service has been restored. Jan 4, 23:31 UTC Investigating - Our third-party email delivery provider has been experiencing an outage since Jan 4th, 2:10 PM PST, causing a delay in notification delivery for all Rippling emails (including password resets). We are investigating this issue with the third-party provider.

entry.title: Issues completing a MFA authenticator challenge
entry.summary: Jan 3, 23:07 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 3, 21:33 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Jan 3, 20:35 UTC Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented. Jan 3, 20:27 UTC Investigating - Users asked to complete an MFA challenge are unable to advance past the page. We are investigating this issue

entry.title: RESOLVED: We are experiencing an issue with Gmail, Google Chat, Google Voice. Our engineering team continues to investigate the issue. We will provide an update by Tuesday, 2022-12-13 10:30 US/Pacific with current details. Users may be facing unavailability for Gmail, Google Chat and Google Voice
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2022-12-13 15:34 and ended at 2022-12-13 18:04 (times are in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)).

A combined Incident Report has been published on our Google Workspace Status Dashboard for this Incident - https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/AzeVS1iCHxhtzgi8r3mc

Affected products: Gmail

entry.title: Missing Workspace section in sidebar
entry.summary: Dec 21, 10:31 PST Resolved - We have implemented the fix and confirmed the issue is resolved. Workspace section and pages have been restored to the sidebar for affected users. Dec 21, 10:06 PST Identified - Since ~3:30pm Pacific time yesterday, some users on Free and Plus plans have been unable to see pages in the Workspace section of the sidebar. We have identified the root cause and a fix is in progress.

entry.title: Incident: Messages on iOS are automatically marked as read
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From Monday December 12, 2022 at 10:27 AM PST to Monday December 19, 2022 at 1:30 PM PST, we began investigating reports of messages being marked as read when backgrounding the iOS app while in a conversation. As a result, the sidebar would not show unread messages next to the DM/Channel/Threads view.
We have now made a change on our end that resolved the issue and released a fix on iOS app version 22.12.21. Users on the iOS app should now be able to receive messages without them being marked as read automatically.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Dec 20, 07:58 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Dec 20, 07:23 UTC Update - We are seeing delayed workflow job status updates for Actions. We are seeing the status update events being backed up and have applied a mitigation. We continue to monitor the delay. Dec 20, 06:55 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions

A mitigation will be deployed shortly. Dec 20, 00:09 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Partial search failres
entry.summary: Dec 18, 19:00 PST Resolved - From approximately 5pm Pacific time yesterday to 8:30am today, Notion experienced an issue that caused some search results to fail. This issue has been resolved.
